events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon at the intersection. My vehicle was hit from the side, causing significant damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a car collision on a public road.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your case and will be reaching out to you shortly to collect further details.
We formally acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the auto accident and have logged your details in our system.
To proceed with the investigation, we require copies of the police report, vehicle photos, and any repair estimates available.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle damage photos have been submitted through the online portal.
Our claims team has started the investigation process and will review the submitted documents and accident details thoroughly.
The investigation into your vehicle collision claim is complete. Liability and damage assessments have been concluded.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover repair costs and associated expenses for your car damage.
The customer has provided positive feedback regarding the communication and handling of their auto accident claim.
Your claim has been officially approved for the settlement amount proposed following the investigation.
The payment corresponding to your approved claim has been issued and should be received within 3 business days.
Your claim related to the auto accident has been successfully closed. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
All documents and details pertaining to your auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
